recipesJson.name: A$AP B'RRY
recipesJson.author: VenSyBoy
recipesJson.description:
Grape Slush 
Purple syrupy Grape juice combined with sweet mixed berries and a icy finish!

TPA Grape juice and FW Grape Soda make the syrupy grape juice with their candy and super sweet profile.

FLV Berry blend contributes making the syrupy juice thicker and richer with notes of blackberry and raspberry, filling the body and background of the vape.

FlV Boysenberry adds a touch of syrupy dark berry. With this little touch makes the recipe twice better.

Ws-23: adjust to your own preference i suggest 1% is best, but for me is a bit low so thats why i posted 2%... feel free to add your go to percentage.

Edit: I think the profile is better with more berry flavour than grape so i dropped both grapes 1% and added 0.25% boysenberry.
